title: Coldplay - Discography
description:
This is a complete collection of the studio releases, the live release, the EPs and singles of Coldplay up until the 3rd of November 2008. It also includes some special limited edition versions  of singles, as well as a demo tape and an early fan club-only release.

Included are:

STUDIO

Albums:
2000 - Parachutes
2002 - A Rush of Blood to the Head
2005 - X & Y
2008 - Viva la Vida or Death and All His Friends

EPs:
1998 - Safety
1999 - Brothers & Sisters
     - The Blue Room
2000 - Sparks (promo acoustic EP)
2001 - Trouble (Norwegian Live EP)

Singles:
2000 - Shiver
     - Yellow
     - Trouble
2001 - Don&#039;t Panic
2002 - In My Place
     - The Scientist
2003 - Clocks
     (+ Special Ltd. Edition: Dutch Live EP)
     - God Put a Smile upon Your Face
2005 - Speed of Sound
     - Fix You
     - Talk
     (+ Special Ltd. Edition: Dutch Live Digipak)
2008 - Violet Hill
     (+ Ltd. Edition 7" Vinyl)
     - Viva la Vida

Demo tape:
1996 - Ode to Deodorant/Brothers & Sisters (double A-side casette)

Fan club-only release:
2001 - Mince Spies

LIVE:
2003 - Live 2003

Majority in 128 kb bitrate.

For more information see: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coldplay


NOTE: some releases contain material previously included in earlier releases. Where the exact same studio recording was used, I have left these tracks out. For example, &#039;Bigger Stronger&#039; appears first on the &#039;Safety&#039; EP, then later on &#039;The Blue Room&#039; EP. In these instances I have opted to include the song on the earliest release only. Where different studio recordings were used I have included them all. For instance, &#039;Brothers & Sisters&#039; appears three times, but each from an entirely different studio recording.
